field.label: View to use for 'SageTV Recordings' listener
field.description: The view to use when the 'SageTV Recordings' event is received. This is the button labeled 'Video' on the Sage Remote.

field.label: Simplified UI options
field.description: When enabled, the most used options for an activity are displayed while advanced options are hidden.

field.label: Resume without prompting
field.description: When enabled, media files that are partially watched will resume from where they were last viewed without being prompted.
